entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
